Plugin.Name: Unraid ZRAM Card
Plugin.Author: John White
Plugin.Overview:
Unraid ZRAM Card provides a beautiful and functional dashboard card for monitoring and managing ZRAM swap devices.
[b]Features:[/b] - Real-time ZRAM usage monitoring with historical charts. - Easy management of ZRAM devices (Create, Resize, Remove). - Global Swappiness control. - Persistent configuration across reboots.
Plugin.Description: Monitor and manage ZRAM swap devices directly from your Unraid dashboard.
